```{r, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
if (!exists("data_blocks")){
    data(NCI60)
}

if (!exists("mcia_results")){
    mcia_results <- nipals_multiblock(data_blocks, preprocMethod='colprofile',
                                  num_PCs = 10, tol=1e-12, plots = 'none')
}
```
